channel.title: Armor is a weapon?
channel.description:
okay so i equip some armor and it takes over weapon slot, it normally does this for dragon plates, or party hats any suggestions on how to fix this? i DID search it, but most of the people that asked this already skipped like 5 steps.
helps appreciated

item.title: Armor is a weapon?
item.dc:creator: @I_Roll_Deep I Roll Deep
item.description:
@I_Roll_Deep wrote:

If you are using Delta, go into the item class(item.java) and look for public int platebody or body(if you want it to be weared as platebody). Or you can just look for a platebody or body id, and look for it into the item class, and there add the ID of the item you want to be weared as body or plateâ€¦

Read full topic
